original_text: And as she was having great difficulty in childbirth, the midwife said to her, “Don’t despair, for you have another son.”
korean_text: 그가 난산할 즈음에 산파가 그에게 이르되 두려워하지 말라 지금 네가 또 득남하느니라 하매

sentences.original_text: And as she was having great difficulty in childbirth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀가 해산하는 데 큰 어려움을 겪고 있을 때
